title: Anyone have a Green Cobb, preferably PSA 3 or 4 for sale?
author: bounce

posts.post_title: Anyone have a Green Cobb, preferably PSA 3 or 4 for sale?
posts.post_content:
Would like to add a Green Cobb to my PC, lost a couple of the not so recent auctions, been close on a couple trades but just haven't quite found the right card for me.

Ideally looking for a PSA 3 or 4, but I would look at similar SGC grades.

Pm or email to [url]david@davidratliff.com[/url] if you've got one available.

Thanks in advance!
Try this one again, got close on a couple but still looking.

I've seen a couple but haven't been able to close a deal yet - anyone else out there with a Green Cobb available?

Let me know

Well lost out in PWCC last night on a couple of these so still trying...

Anyone got a green cobb they can't stand any more?!?!  :)
